item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:34 Chances: The recent ordinance in Minneapolis may impact Lyft’s operations in the city, but the company has the opportunity to negotiate and find a solution with the city council. Despite the recent dip in Lyft’s stock, the company has the potential to rebound as the technology sector undergoes a major transition.
